alert.note: Alert for Crosby; Garza; Lubbock; Lynn (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 11:57PM CDT until July 08 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lubbock County in northwestern Texas... Lynn County in northwestern Texas... Western Garza County in northwestern Texas... Southwestern Crosby County in northwestern Texas... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1157 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southeast of Slide, or 12 miles north of Tahoka, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...West Texas Mesonet station in Reese Center recorded a wind gust to 60 mph. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lubbock, Slaton, Post, Tahoka, Wolfforth, Idalou, Ralls, Lorenzo, Ransom Canyon, Grassland, Lubbock South Plains Mall, Caprock, Texas Tech University, Lubbock International Airport, Southland, Slide, Downtown Lubbock, Woodrow, Reese Center and Wilson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with this storm will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
